plans_onetime.text: You get: Builder lapel pin. Editorial reports. Swag giveaways. Tyee event discounts. That warm fuzzy feeling that comes with doing something good.
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus the knowledge that your contribution could cover the entry fee for four access-to-information requests.
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus a pack of three Tyee greeting cards featuring the leaders of B.C.’s major political parties
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus a pack of six Tyee greeting cards
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus two packs of Tyee greeting cards, and free entry to a Tyee ‘Beyond the Headlines’ event for you and a guest
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus an invitation to an annual dinner with Tyee reporters and editors, and a beautiful book of photographs by Wade Davis.
